item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: In no particular order, what’s on my bookshelves. Generally speaking, those I like more will find their way to the top of each list. Rating system: All time favorite. Dare I say, lifechanging: ‚ù§ Insightful: ü§Ø Practical: üõ† Management When I became the manager of a team back during my time at Microsoft, I had confidence in my technical abilities, but not really in my ability to be of service for the people who now reported to me.
